lines.text: All right, all right, all right.
That's what I love about these high school girls, man. I get older, they stay the same age.
Say, man, you got a joint?
No, not on me, man.
It'd be a lot cooler if you diid.

Man, it's the same bullshit they tried to pull in my day. If it ain't that piece of paper, there's some other choice they're gonna try and make for you. You gotta do what Randall Pink Floyd wants to do man. Let me tell you this, the older you do get the more rules they're gonna try to get you to follow. You just gotta keep livin' man, L-I-V-I-N.

Well, all I'm saying is that I want to look back and say that I did I the best I could while I was stuck in this place. Had as much fun as I could while I was stuck in this place. Played as hard as I could while I was stuck in this place... Dogged as many girls as I could while I was stuck in this place.

Okay guys, one more thing, this summer when you're being inundated with all this American bicentennial Fourth Of July brouhaha, don't forget what you're celebrating, and that's the fact that a bunch of slave-owning, aristocratic, white males didn't want to pay their taxes.
All I'm saying is that if I ever start referring to these as the best years of my life - remind me to kill myself.
Will you marry me?
I don't know. What's in it for me?
Anything you want?
Anything?
Anything.

[opening his mouth wide]
Go like this. Do you spit or swallow?
Whatever you like.
Whatever I like? I would definitely marry you.

Behind every good man there is a woman, and that woman was Martha Washington, man, and everyday George would come home, she would have a big fat bowl waiting for him, man, when he come in the door, man, she was a hip, hip, hip lady, man.

You know that Julie chick? Loves you. You want her? Gotta play it cool, you know. You can't let her know how much you like ?cause if she knows, she'll dump you like that. Believe me. Like, if she asks you if you want a ride, you say, "No, I've got my own ride, but maybe I'll see you later." Sounds stupid, doesn't it? It works.
Imagine how many people out there are fuckin' right now man, just goin' at it.
What are you looking at? Wipe that face off your head, bitch.
George Washington was in a cult, and the cult was into aliens, man.
I love those redheads!
Don't air raid for that bitch, I hate that shit. It's like that Clint fucker in front of all his friends. Huh? Huh mother fucker.
Okay Mike.
Dominant male monkey mother fucker.
11 Positrac outback, 750 double pumper, Edelbrock intake, bored over 30, 11 to 1 pop-up pistons, turbo-jet 390 horsepower. We're talkin' some fuckin' muscle.
You are an embarrassment to the game of pool and should be glad I even let you play at my table.
So, you're not gonna go to law school? What do you wanna do then?
I wanna dance!
I only came here to do two things, kick some ass and drink some beer.
[glances over his shoulder]
Looks like we're almost outta beer.
I may play ball next fall, but I will never sign that. Now me and my loser friends are gonna head out to buy Aerosmith tickets. Top priority of the summer.
I'd like to quit thinking of the present, like right now, as some minor, insignificant preamble to somethin' else.
Didja ever look at a dollar bill, man? There's some spooky shit goin' on there. And it's green too.
Hey Slater, you fuckin' hippie, give me drugs, man.
Go get some from your mother, man.
We just bagged your mother.
Okay, fuck you dickhead.

I call it the "every other decade" theory. The 50's were boring. The 60's rocked. The 70's, my god, they obviously suck. So maybe the 80s will be like, radical. I figure we'll be in our 20's and hey, it can't get any worse.
What did you just say?
What?
Just now, man. When you walked past, what'd you say?
About what?
You said, "Someone's tokin' some reefer."
No, I meant somewhere I smell some pot, you know? It was just an observation.
Oh, an observation, huh? Well who the hell are you, man? Isaac fucking Newton?
I'm letting you have shotgun. But cuz it's cuz only 'cuz I'm goin' inside.
[repeated line]
Shotgun!
What are you looking at? Huh? I'll kick your fucking ass, right now! What are you smiling at? Freshman faggot!
[shoves Mitch]
Fuck all of you! Fuck you!
Is that a beer in your hand?
Why, yes it is.
Have you had more than one of those?
Few. No one's counting.
When were you supposed to be home?
Few hours ago I think.
Thats bullshit. That's major bullshit. You know I was barely let out at your age?
Aww.
Aww. Well don't think she won't be waiting up for you. And she is tough. I've been through it.
Just don't ask her to take it easy on me.
Have you been drinking?
No
[falls on bed and can't even take off both boots]
Are you drunk?

[clearly drunk]
Psshh
You act like you're so oppressed. You guys are kings of the school. What are you bitching about?
You're an asshole.
I know I am.
Not bad for a little freshman but you gotta watch out for older girls
Hey. Come here. We just wanna know something. You gonna be fucking that tonight, or are you gonna be a little wimp?

[laughs]
How do you know I haven't already

[clearly pleased, laughs]
Go along man, I think its past your bedtime!
Yeah, well, listen. You ought to ditch the two geeks you're in the car with now and get in with us. But that's all right, we'll worry about that later. I will see you there. All right?
Nothing like piling on old pancakes and syrup after a night of beer drinking.

This place used to be off limits, man, 'cause some drunk freshman fell off. He went right down the middle, smacking his head on every beam, man. I hear it doesn't hurt after the first couple though. Autopsy said he had one beer, how many did you have?
Four.
You're dead, man, you're so dead. Look at the blood stains right there.
Marijuana on one. Reefer on two.
Mitchy. Mitchy, mitchy, mitchy...
[all the guys laugh]
We're lookin' for you pal. Your ass will be purple before the day is over!
Aerosmith, 2 weeks. Don't forget.
[slaps her ass]
I won't.
Don, give the beer back, man!
I paid for the beer, man.
So your earlier offer still stands?
What should I say? Whatever you like.
It was vicious. Had some pretty cool seniors though. Like, they'd beat the hell out of you and then get you drunk, that sort of thing.
Cool.
I was getting there! I had my hand under her shirt!
Hear that, he was 'getting there'. Son, you wouldn't even know what to do if you got there.
Man I hate that guy, he's a jerk. He is a jerk, right?
Yeah. He's kind of a joke.
And there you guys were in class, trying to list all the Gilligan's Island episodes without even a *hint* of irony.
What the hell are you talking about, girl?
Weren't thinking about it, were you?
Gilligan's Island?
It's what known as a male pornographic fantasy.

[laughs]
Oh my...

Think about it! You're basically alone on a deserted island with two readily available women. One, a seductive sex goddess type. The other... a healthy girl-next-door type with a nice butt. So guys have it all - the Madonna and the whore. And women get nothing! We get a geek... an overweight middle-aged guy... some nerdy scientific type, I mean...

[interrupts]
The professor... is sexy.
It's what everybody in this car needs is some good ol' worthwhile visceral experience.
Lick me, all of you.
This first lick I'd like to dedicate to your mother... fuck her.

[after seniors threaten him]
Er, Mr. Payne. Sir. You know every second that you could let us out early would really increase our chances of survival.
It's like our sergeant told us before one trip into the jungle.
lines.character: Mr. Payne, junior high school teacher

lines.text: [shouts]
Men!
lines.character: Mr. Payne, junior high school teacher

lines.text: [the boys jump]
Fifty of you are leaving on a mission. Twenty-five of you ain't coming back.
lines.character: Mr. Payne, junior high school teacher

lines.text: Okay.
Watch them fly... away
Hey you guys know what that song is about? Its about the aliens. We're the aliens man, we're the savages. We're the savages man.

[Wooderson has just driven off after hitting on Cynthia]
God, that was so creepy!
Wait, why are you smiling?

[shrugs]
I thought he was cute.
Ugh, that's disgusting!
You thought he was cute? Do you realize when he graduated we were like three years old?
God, don't you ever feel like everything we do and everything we've been taught is just to service the future?
Yeah I know, like it's all preparation.
Right. But what are we preparing ourselves for?
Death.
Life of the party.
It's true.

You know, but that's valid because if we are all gonna die anyway shouldn't we be enjoying ourselves now? You know, I'd like to quit thinking of the present, like right now, as some minor insignificant preamble to something else.
I'm just trying to be honest about being a misanthrope.
Hey, I got a favour to ask you guys. You know my little brother?
Yeah, Mitch Kramer
Ya, Mitch Kramer. Well, take it easy on him this summer will ya?
Don't worry sis, little brother's safe with us.
Well just don't get him worse than the other guys. He's kinda little.
[walks off]
Ok. I promise.
[Jodi walks off]
There was just a little bit of bullshit in all that right?
Major bullshit. He's a dead man.
Wait a minute. Who put the keg all the way out here in the woods?
I dunno. This is where they said it would be
Really?
Really? We don't need the beer anyway.
[start making out]
Heard they got you pretty bad.
Yeah.
They just got Hersh too
Was it bad?
Yeah.
Was it O'Bannion?
I think so
Man I hate that jerk!
Hey I didn't know Jodi was you're big sister
Oh, yeah
Hey, I hear my name over here? You guys talking about me? Mitch, I heard they got you pretty bad. Those guys... you know I asked them to take it easy on you?
What? Well no wonder!
Don, have you ever thought about why we play football? How many times have you gotten laid strictly because you're a football player?
I don't know. A few, I guess.
A few? Don, all I'm saying is, I bet we could do just as well if we were in a band or something.
Yeah, there's always one senior who has to be the bad-ass.

Before next fall you're in need of a serious attitude adjustment, young man. You'd better get your priorities straight. And watch out with that other crowd you're runnin' with. Don't think I haven't noticed.
Hey ladies, are you gonna be ready to play football this fall? huh?
I don't know coach, I've been doin' so well in english I thought I might work on bein' a writer. What do ya think about that?
Boy, you woudln't know how to spell your own name if it wasn't stencilled on your locker.
We're not in Junior High any more. We're freshmen. We're in the big time now... where the girls will be puttin' out all the time.

[singing]
Watch them fly...

[stoned]
Hey you know that song is about the aliens?
Don't let the fact that you won't be able to sit down all summer affect your game
What did she say? Like, what did she call me?
Nothing!
Oh, come on, "nothing", I know you're lying when you do that. I know you're lying, you bitch.
Come on, we know they talk about us, just tell us.
You swear you're not gonna get mad?
I'm not gonna get mad, I'm just curious.
I'm not gonna get mad, I think it's a riot. I don't care what she thinks.
OK, she called you a bitch and you a slut.
A slut? She called me a slut? Oh my god, what a bitch.

[laughing]
Simone, everybody calls you a slut.
Oh, shit!
Shavonne! That bitch, I'm gonna kick her ass!
I thought you said you weren't gonna get mad?
I'm not mad.
Walkin' down the hall, by myself, smokin' a jay with fifty elves.
I did it when I was a freshman, and you'll do it when you're seniors. but you're doing great. Now fry like bacon, you little freshman piggies. Fry!
Your days of lying around all night with Clementine are over.
Yeah right.
Just remember, those guys don't care if you win or lose.
Are you starting again next year?
I dunno man, I may not even play.
You just wasted another fucking beer.
Hey can we have a couple of those beers?
These beers? Why?
Just gimme a beer.
You're Mitch, right? I think I heard about you.
Oh really, what did you hear?
I don't know, man, are you OK?

[embarrassed]
Oh... yeah.
What's up?
Nothing.
Nothing much?
Nothing at all.
They actually let you buy it?
Course
Man just wait till I get to college!
You guys know anything about a party?
No sir.
Put some ice on it. After that, there's nothing a few beers won't take care of.
I didn't think drugs and alchohol were such a big deal they had to resort to Neo-McCarthyism to get rid of it.
I think they're just worried that some of us are having too good a time.
Have you seen Jodi around?
No she left your ass.
Well you win some you lose some.
Slater-san, how's it goin'?
Fixin' to be a lot better, man.

[to Sabrina about the hazing]
We were just discussing the utter stupidity of these initiation rituals, and we were wondering how someone such as you would subject themselves to the losing end of it all.
What are we, having social hour over here? You're supposed to be being a bitch.

[after Jodi takes Sabrina away]
Am I mistaken or was there some unspoken thing between you and that young vixen... you stud.
Well you know how it is.
Yeah, I bet she's pretty cute once you clean all the shit off her.
Yeah I bet she is.
NeoMcCarthyism, I like that.

[describing his dream]
So there I am, getting it on with this perfect female body and...
What?
I can't say.
No, you can't give a build-up like that and not deliver. You know, a perfect female body, it's not a bad start.
But with the head of Abraham Lincoln. With the hat and the beard, everything.
I feel like I'm being stalked by a Nazi.
Y'all ready to bust some ass?
Oh, man, I'm fuckin' wasted.
Mmm... bowling ball. Bowling ball. Yeah throw it. Faggot, sissy, pussy, freshman.
You cool man?
Like how?

[rolling his eyes as he walks away]
OK.
He was asking if you get high.
Did you hear that O'Bannion flunked?
Yeah, what a dumbshit.
There's Shavonne. I think she might still be mad at me Watch me get something going here.
[the girls show up]
Hey, what's going on?
Hey, not much. How about you?
Oh, a little weed, you know. There may be a beer bust later on.
Oh really? Cool, so I guess we'll see ya there?
All right, check ya later!
[the girls leave]
Slate man, why are you always such a dork man?
What are you talking about man?
Check ya later! Check ya later!
Hey man, get off my case man.
Slater alligator
Step into my head.
What girlfriend?
What's her name... Simone.
Oh. Her.
I can't believe she called me a slut. What a bitch!

[laughing]
Simone everyone calls you a slut
Shavonne!
Let's go smoke that joint
Is he in for a surprise
After a couple of years no one will even remember
Ask Tony to marry you.
Will you marry me?
Oh god, what am I supposed to say?
I dont know.
Uh, whadda ya do for me?
Umm, anything you like.

[turns to Mike]
Imagine the possibilities.
Who are you?
Um... no one. I mean I'm not in the trucks
You're freshman?
Yeah...
So... are you in or are you out?
In, I guess
So what do you guys do... for fun I mean
Mostly hang out, y'know? There's gonna be a big party tonight, should be fun.
Oh, cool. Sounds fun.

[nice]
You wanna come?

[happy]
Sure!
Cynthia, man? I like it, man.
Red's a good color for you.
My favorite color.

[mockingly, to Mike and Tony]
Woodward, Bernstein.
Guess that makes you Deep Throat.

[after the fight with Clint]
I got some good ones in there, right? I mean, you wouldn't say I got my ass kicked, would you?
Oh no, I mean, after a few years, no one will even remember really, who won or lost.
Right, like when you read about Hemingway and those guys, no one ever talks about who won, just they got in a brawl.
[repeated line]
Man I hate that guy!
I guess I'll have to get used to seeing you at the same social functions as me. And hanging out with people I know.
It's best to get it all at once. After the first 10 licks your ass gets so numb you don't feel it.
Air raid or it's your ass.
Don't do it Sabrina

[drunk]
Oh that's it, Miss Hot Stuff. I'm gonna make the next year of your life a living hell
[laughs and walks off]
LICK ME! All of you!
They're really doing this
Yeah, they want it back by the end of the day too. Can you believe it?
And everybody's signing it?
Just to get the coaches off our backs, they're being fucking assholes. That's why you sign it and never think about it again. Just ket it go.
[looks pissed and crumples it]
You're gonna make a big deal outta this aren't you?
Ok girlies. It's really hot out here and I'm really sick of looking at you.
What are we having social hour over here? I'm supposed to be being a bitch.
Vicki. Come on, let's skip out and go get naked. Come on let's go.
